name: HOI AN HERITAGE
description:
Welcome to the HOI AN ancient town! HOI AN is an old town in central Vietnam that retains its ancient beauty from the 15th century. However, many ancient structures are gradually decaying due to the bureaucracy and corruption of the old local government.

As a newly elected mayor, you have to maintain and preserve the architectural heritage of HOI AN and ensure the economic well-being of the people.

CONTROLS:

  • A, S, W, D (or arrow keys) move the camera around
  • Q, E for zooming in/out
  • Left mouse button for interacting, building, investing

NOTE:

I made this game for the Cultural Heritage Game Jam 2021.

This is a fictional story
